sentences.en: Alga About the concept of alga Gu Jin differs.
sentences.cn: 藻类关于藻类的概念古今不同.

sentences.en: Alga extract can smooth, moisturize the skin and remove the wrinkles.
sentences.cn: 海藻提取精华可爽滑、除皱 、 强化滋润.

sentences.en: Can be alga of honey, calcium tablet, helix taken together?
sentences.cn: 蜂蜜 、 钙片 、 螺旋藻能一同服用 吗 ?

sentences.en: Can be alga treated gastritis and go spot?
sentences.cn: 螺旋藻能治疗胃炎和去斑 吗 ?

sentences.en: Even more strangely, the researchers think the salamanders might inherit the alga from their parents.
sentences.cn: 更奇怪的是，研究人员认为这些海藻是火蜥蜴从它们父母那里继承来的。

sentences.en: Ingredients : white tuckahoe, aloe , white awn, seawater, alga, evergreen bines, angelica, chamomile, glossy ganoderma, etc.
sentences.cn: 多种名贵中药,直接针对眼部,增强眼机能的循环动力, 使保持眼睛膨胀的增压液气流贯通, 气助血行,气血相生, 眼睛滋生神采.

sentences.en: Main Ingredients: hamamelis, cypress, chamomile, liquorice, aloe, lavender and alga extract etc.
sentences.cn: 主要成份: 金缕梅 、 黄柏菊花 、 甘草 、 芦荟 、 熏衣草、海藻提取物等.

sentences.en: OBJECTIVE To study the bioactive constituents of marine brown alga Sargassum carpophyllum J.
sentences.cn: 目的研究褐藻叶托马尾藻的活性成分.

sentences.en: Phycobiliproteins are important light - harvesting pigment proteins found in some alga, including Phycocyanin allophycocyanin, Phycoerythrin and Pycoerycyanin.
sentences.cn: 藻胆蛋白是某些藻类中一类重要的捕光色素蛋白, 包括藻红蛋白 、 藻蓝蛋白、别藻蓝蛋白、藻红蓝蛋白.

sentences.en: Red globose alga is actually a kind of green alga, which can be used as feedstuff.
sentences.cn: 红球藻实际上是一种绿藻, 它可以用来做饲料.

sentences.en: Screening anti - tumor active components from alga which contains hundreds bioactive components has been given by attention.
sentences.cn: 藻类中含有多种生物活性成分,从中筛选抗肿瘤活性成分已成为当前研究热点.

sentences.en: Spiral alga has a slimming effect, it is popular with many women.
sentences.cn: 螺旋藻有减肥的作用, 受到许多女士的欢迎.

sentences.en: The freshwater blue - green alga Phormidium foveolarum Gom. was grown on medi - um containing hydrocarbons.
sentences.cn: 坑形席藻(PhormidiumfoveolarumGom. )是长期培养于含石油烃基质的淡水蓝藻.

sentences.en: The freshwater blue - green alga Phormidium foveolarum Gom. was grown on medi - um containing hydrocarbons.
sentences.cn: 坑形席藻(Phormidium foveolarum Gom. )是长期培养于含石油烃基质的淡水蓝藻.

sentences.en: The microorganisms employed include mainly chemical conversion bacteria, phototropic bacteria and alga.
sentences.cn: 所利用的生物体主要包括:化学转化细菌 、 向光性细菌和藻类.

sentences.en: The shampoo composition features that it contains both blue - green alga extract and scurf eliminating agent.
sentences.cn: 本发明香波组合物的特征在于同时包含蓝藻提取物和去屑剂.

sentences.en: The town is the centre of a black-market trade in facai, a species of alga whose name is spelt and pronounced similarly to 'get rich'.
sentences.cn: 这座城镇是一个发菜黑市交易的中心。 发菜是一种藻类，在汉语里它的写法和发音类似于“发财”。
